title: Season 10 in a nutshell
body:
I don't know what happened from S9 to S10, but can someone please explain to me how I get people like this in my games... There's only so much I can do as a support to try and win the game for my team when they do shit like this. Literally team difference like 85% of games that I play, it's disgusting. 

If anyone has any suggestions on how to win ranked games, I'm literally all ears. Should just move to a different region.

replies.body:
can we also appreciate how riot wants to place garen, darius, zed, and mord in the jg as a way to make players want to play jg :)) coz everyone keeps complaining about how they ruined jg. 


s10 gonna be a good season am I right?

Maybe it's an ad, but take a look! Im doing daily Katarina content (plus other champs!) Customs skins and montages/gameplay! You should take a look if you love daily League content. Maybe you'll love it! :yum:  https://www.youtube.com/c/MihuKat
If this is the worst game you're getting, S10 is doing fine. If you dont include the last fight you were tied in kills and gold, a close game that you lost.
